content: romain-lfg: Working on three significant feature implementations with open PRs #3361 (Bounty Detail), #3320 (Bounty Board), and #3315 (Frontend Implementation), making substantial code changes across 97 files (+24,821/-225 lines) over 17 commits. Active on 3 days this week with a focus primarily on feature development (82%), showing significant progress on these new capabilities despite no merged PRs yet.
